price: Wakamchinja. Basi (Swaleh) akasema: Stareheni katika mji wenu muda wa siku tatu. Hiyo ni ahadi isiyo kuwa ya uwongo.
arabic: فَعَقَرُوهَا فَقَالَ تَمَتَّعُواْ فِي دَارِكُمۡ ثَلَٰثَةَ أَيَّامٖۖ ذَٰلِكَ وَعۡدٌ غَيۡرُ مَكۡذُوبٖ
footnotes: Na wao wasiisikie nasaha yake, wala wasimkubalie. Kiburi chao na dharau yao iliwapelekea kumuuwa yule ngamia. Basi yeye akawaambia: Stareheni na maisha yenu ya kilimwengu katika miji yenu muda wa siku tatu. Kisha baadae itakujieni adhabu ya Mwenyezi Mungu. Hiyo ni ahadi ya kweli wala haina kinyume, wala haina uwongo ndani yake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: faʿaqarūhā faqāla tamattaʿū fī dārikum thalāthata ayyāmin dhālika waʿdun ghayru makdhūbin
